subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire, who had knee surgery two months ago, said he would try to play against the Trail Blazers on Tuesday if he continued to improve.
snippet: The Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire, who had knee surgery two months ago, said he would try to play against the Trail Blazers on Tuesday if he continued to improve.
